js_script: function validateEmail(email) { const re = /^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/; const allowedDomains = [example.com"
status: evoulth.com]; if (!re.test(email)) return false; const domain = email.split("@")[1]; return allowedDomains.includes(domain); }"

js_script: function validatePassword(password) { const re = /^(?=.*[A-Z])(?=.*[a-z])(?=.*\d)(?=.*[@$!%*?&])[A-Za-z\d@$!%*?&]{8,}$/; return re.test(password); }
function validatePhone(number) { const re = /^(\+91[\-\s]?)?[6-9]\d{9}$/; return re.test(number); }
function validateDate(date) { const parsed = Date.parse(date); if (isNaN(parsed)) return false; return new Date(parsed) <= new Date(); }
function validateUsername(username) { const re = /^[a-zA-Z0-9_]{3,20}$/; return re.test(username); }

function validateCardNumber(number) { const sanitized = number.replace(/\D/g, "); let sum = 0; let shouldDouble = false; for (let i = sanitized.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) { let digit = parseInt(sanitized[i]); if (shouldDouble) { digit *= 2; if (digit > 9) digit -= 9; } sum += digit; shouldDouble = !shouldDouble; } return sum % 10 === 0; }
function validateFileSize(file, maxMB = 5) { return file.size <= maxMB * 1024 * 1024; }
